name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.postarticle: node bin/feed.js && node bin/html.js --latest && node bin/html-validator.js --latest && cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages && cd - && git switch -
scripts.postbook: node bin/feed.js && node bin/html.js && cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages && cd - && git switch -
scripts.postimage: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message "Add images" && cd -
scripts.postlink: node bin/feed.js && node bin/html.js && cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages && cd - && git switch -
scripts.poststatus: node bin/feed.js && node bin/html.js && cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages && cd - && git switch -
scripts.test: prettier --check --log-level warn . && stylelint static/css/ && eslint *.js bin/ static/js/
scripts.preversion: git switch upnext && npm test && npm audit && npm ci && git rebase main && git switch main && git merge --ff-only upnext
scripts.version: node bin/feed.js && node bin/html.js --all && node bin/html-validator.js && node bin/static.js
scripts.postversion: git push origin main --tags && git switch upnext && git rebase main
